# StructMetQSM

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of TreeSM is to provide easy to use functions to quickly obtain structural metrics from tree point clouds and their respective TreeQSMs obtained with version 2.4.0 of TreeQSM (https://github.com/InverseTampere/TreeQSM).

## Installation

You can install the development version of TreeSM from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lmterryn/StructMetQSM")
```
